column2: "Na Josua no wu ekyir no
column3: Israelmba bisaa EWURADZE dɛ
column4: Woana na ondzi kan ntu nkɔ Keenanfo do nye hɔn nkɔko mma hɛn?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE buaa dɛ
column3: Juda ntu nkɔ: hwɛ medze asaase no ahyɛ ne nsa."

column2: "Na Juda see no nua Simeon dɛ
column3: Enye me nkɔ me kyɛfa mu
column4: ma yɛnye Keenanfo nkɔko; na mo so menye wo bɔkɔ wo kyɛfa mu. Na Simeon nye no kɔree."

column2: "Na Juda tui kɔree: na EWURADZE dze Keenanfo nye Perizfo no hyɛɛ hɔn nsa: na wokum hɔn mu nyimpa mpem du wɔ Bezek."
"Na wohun Adoni-bezek wɔ Bezek: na wɔnye no koe
column3: na wokum Keenanfo nye Perizfo no."

column2: "Na Adoni-bezek guanee; na wotsiiw no
column3: na kɛkyeer no wotwitwaa ne nsa kokrobetsir na n'anansɔba kokonyin."

column2: "Na Adoni-bezek see dɛ Ahemfo eduosuon a hɔn nsa kokrobetsir na hɔn anansɔba kokonyin etwitwa no tasetasee hɔn edziban wɔ mo pon ase: na dza meyɛe no
column3: dɛmara so na Nyankopɔn ama me ho akatua yi. Na wɔdze no baa Jerusalɛm
column4: na hɔ na owui."

column2: "Na Judamba no nye Jerusalɛm koe
column3: na wɔgyee
column4: na wɔdze anomu bɔɔ no
column5: na wɔtoo kurow no mu gya."

column2: "Na n'ekyir no Judamba no kɔree kɛnyee Keenanfo a wɔtse nkokodo nkurow mu
column3: na Pomu afamu
column4: na ɔbɔnmu nkurow mu no koe."

column2: "Na Juda kɔr Keenanfo a wɔtse Hebron no do: nkyɛ nkan no nna Hebron ne dzin nye Kiriat-arba na wɔbɔɔ Sesai
column3: na Ahiman
column4: na Talmai."

column2: "Na hɔ na wofi kɔr Debirfo do. Afei Debir nkyɛ nkan no ne dzin nye Kiriat-sefer."
"Na Kaleb see dɛ
column3: Nyia ɔbɔbɔ Kiriat-sefer
column4: na ɔbɛgye no medze me babaa Aksa bɛma no awar."

column2: "Na Kaleb no nua kuma Kenaz ne babanyin Otiniel kɛgyee; na ɔdze ne babaa Aksa maa no ayewar."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a basia no kɔr ne nkyɛn no
column4: Otiniel dɛfɛdɛfɛɛw no dɛ ombisa n'egya hɔ haban bi; na aber a Aksa fi n'asoaso do dwirii no; Kaleb bisaa no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Ma me akyɛdze; sɛ edze me esi Pomu afamu asaase do a
column4: nna ma me mbasu so ɛ. Na Kaleb dze etsifi mbasu na anaafo mbasu no maa no."

column2: "Na Moses n'asew
column3: Kennyi no ne mba no nye Judamba fi nkyiresua kurow no mu fowee kɔr Juda sar a ɔwɔ Arad pomu afamu no do; na wɔkɔree kɛnyee ɔman no tsenae."
column4: "#Atsɛ 4.11

column2: "Na Juda nye no nua Simeon kɔree
column3: na wokokum Keenanfo a wɔtse Zefat no
column4: na wɔsɛɛ no pasapasa. Na wɔfrɛɛ kurow no ne dzin Horma."

column2: "Na Juda kɛgyee Gaza nye ne he
column3: na Ashkelon nye ne he
column4: na Ekron nye ne he."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dzii Juda n'ekyir; na otuu nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ nkokodo nkurow mu no; na hɔn a wɔwɔ ɔbɔn no mu no dze
column3: oenntum enntu hɔn
column4: osiandɛ nna wɔwɔ dadze ntseaseanam."

column2: "Na wɔdze Hebron maa Kaleb
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no: na otuu Anak mbabanyin baasa no fii hɔ."

column2: "Naaso Benjaminmba no enntu Jebusfo a wɔtse Jerusalɛm no: mbom Jebusfo no nye Benjaminmba no tsenaa Jerusalɛm araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
"Na Josef fi no so fowee kɔr Bɛtɛl do: na EWURADZE dzii hɔn ekyir."
"Na Josef fi no somae ma wɔkɛseraa Bɛtɛl. Nkan no nkyɛ kurow no ne dzin nye Luz."
"Na aserafo no hun banyin bi a ofi kurow no mu epue
column3: na wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Yɛserɛ wo
column5: kyerɛ hɛn kurow no mu kwan
column6: na yɛnye wo bedzi no yie."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛɛ hɔn kurow no mu kwan
column3: na wɔdze afona bɔɔ kurow no: mbom banyin no na n'ebusuafo nyinara dze
column4: wogyaa hɔn."

column2: "Na banyin no kɔr Hitifo asaase do
column3: na ɔkɛkyekyeer kurow
column4: na ɔtoo no dzin Luz: ɔno nye ne dzin araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ enntu nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ Bɛt-sean na no nkuraase
column3: na Taanak a wɔwɔ Dor na no nkuraase
column4: na hɔn a wɔwɔ Ibleam na no nkuraase
column5: na hɔn a wɔwɔ Megiddo na no nkuraase: na Keenanfo no dze
column6: wɔpɛɛ dɛ wɔtsena asaase no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Israel hɔn ho yɛɛ dzen no
column4: wɔhyɛɛ Keenanfo no ma wɔyɛɛ ɔsom edwuma
column5: na mbom woenntu hɔn ase korakora."

column2: "Na Efraim enntu Keenanfo a wɔtse Gezer no; na Keenanfo no tsenaa hɔn mu wɔ Gezer."
"Zebulun enntu Kitronfo
column3: na Na-halolfo no so; na Keenanfo no tsenaa hɔn mu na Zebulunfo no hyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔbɛyɛɛ ɔman a wɔyɛ ɔsom edwuma."

column2: "Aser enntu hɔn a wɔtsetse Ako
column3: anaa hɔn a wɔtsetse Zidon
column4: na Ahlab

column2: "na Aserfo no tsenaa Keenanfo no mu
column3: asaase no do atsefo no a: osiandɛ woenntu hɔn."

column2: "Naftali enntu hɔn a wɔtsetse Bɛt-semes
column3: anaa hɔn a wɔtsetse Bɛt-anat no; mbom ɔtsenaa Keenanfo no mu
column4: asaase no do atsefo no a: naaso hɔn a wɔtsetse Bɛt-semes na Bɛt-anat no bɛyɛɛ ɔman a wɔyɛ ɔsom edwuma wɔ nhyɛ do."

column2: "Na Amorifo no kaa Danmba no kɔr nkokodo nkurow no mu: na wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔma hɔn kwan ma wosian ba ɔbɔn no mu:"
"na Amorifo no pɛɛ dɛ wɔtsena bepɔw Heres do wɔ Aijalon
column3: na Saalbim: naaso Josef fi no ne nsa daa hɔn do
column4: ma wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ma wɔbɛyɛɛ ɔman a wɔyɛ ɔsom edwuma wɔ nhyɛ do."

column2: "Na Amorifo he no fi Akrabbim mfowee
column3: ofi ɔbotan no ho dze kɔ enyim no ho."
